Title: Ear-Sy Rider
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Dan Fybel, Rich Rinaldi, Nora Smith (story)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Plot: While a biker gang begins hanging out at the restaurant, Louise goes through a crisis after a teenager steals her bunny ear hat.
